summary: Work on context compression and evaluation of Tool-assisted LLMs.
Responsible for the front-end of the **[Huozi(活字) LLM](http://huozi.8wss.com/)**, a Chinese LLM developed by HIT-SCIR.
Participated in code vulnerability prediction DevOps Plugin development.

company: Harbin Institute of Technology ACM Training Team
summary: As a member (and small team leader) of the HIT ACM Training Team, participated in the ACM-ICPC Asia Regional Contest 2018 in Zhengzhou and Beijing (Silver Medal).
